name: W.I.S.H Necklace
description:
-Gold plated ball chain necklace w/ a Wishing bottle.

- Wishing bottle comes with a scroll that can be personalized with a special message or "WISH" for yourself, a friend or loved one. A constant reminder of your goals, dreams, triumphs, strengths and love! 

- Measurements: 
The ball chain is 30inches. We can make it longer per your request. If it exceeds 40 inches, there will be an extra charge.

For special orders and sizes please email us at:
customize@wishcreatively.com

SPECIAL MESSAGE IN THE BOTTLE:
Unless specified, the scrolls in the bottle will be blank. If you would like us to write a special message in there, please email us at:
customize@wishcreatively.com. Also include your full name and your order number.

name: "Blue" W.I.S.H BRACELET
description:
-Black Leather and Gold Plated Bracelet 

- Includes 3 charms: "WISH" Charm, Lamb Leather Tassle, Wishing Bottle.

- Wishing bottle comes with a scroll that can be personalized with a special message or "WISH" for yourself, a friend or loved one. A constant reminder of your goals, dreams, triumphs, strengths and love! 

- Measurements: 
Women: 7.5 inches
Men: 9 inches
